```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Load your library

```{r, include=TRUE, message=FALSE}
library(mcmsupply)
library(dplyr)
```

## Get your data

```{r, include=TRUE, message=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
raw_subnatdata <- mcmsupply::get_subnational_data(local=FALSE, mycountry=NULL, fp2030=TRUE) 
```

## Get the JAGS model inputs from the cleaned data


```{r, include=TRUE, message=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
pkg_data <- mcmsupply::get_subnational_modelinputs(local=FALSE, mycountry=NULL,
                                                          startyear=1990, endyear=2028.5,
                                                          nsegments=12, raw_subnatdata)

```

## Run JAGS model

```{r message=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
run_subnational_jags_model(pkg_data = pkg_data, local=FALSE, main_path = "results/global/", n_iter = 80000, n_burnin = 10000, n_thin = 35, mycountry=NULL)

```

## Get posterior point estimates

```{r, message=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
get_subnational_P_point_estimates(main_path = "results/subnational/global/", pkg_data, local=FALSE, mycountry=NULL)
```


## Plot posterior point estimates

```{r, include=TRUE, message=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
plot_subnational_point_estimates(main_path = "results/subnational/", pkg_data = pkg_data, vis_path = "visualisation/subnational/global", local=FALSE, mycountry=NULL)
```
